help-file.title: COMMUNE
help-file.content:
Unlike most spellcasters, Druids do not need to memorize or pray. They have allied themselves with the natural world so well that they commune with their surroundings to derive the natural essence that is necessary for their spells. This essence is more abundant in untamed wilds. What this means is, Druids will regenerate their spells, while standing, at a rate that varies dependent on what terrain they are in.
Type 'commune' for a list of spells that are being regenerated back.
